TopicTitle: Help With Making B9 Part Switch Ore Tank

Articles.Content:
Hi, everyone!

I'm trying to use B9 part switch to make the stock ore tanks have switchable variants for Water and CarbonDioxide (for some custom ISRU patches I've made), but I really have no idea where to start. Any help would be appreciated!

 

Thanks,

Windspren

If you have a question about a specific mod you're much better off posting in the thread for that mod rather than a generic modding thread. The people that build and support B9 Part Switch read and respond on their own thread, but may never even check this folder
